meanings.sent1: The food at the cafeteria was the awfullest I have ever tasted.
meanings.sent2: The storm last night was the awfullest we've experienced all year.
meanings.sent3: The awfullest part of the movie was when the main character tripped over nothing.
meanings.sent4: The awfullest feeling crept over her as she realized she had forgotten her keys inside.
meanings.sent5: The awfullest smell from the garbage bin made everyone cover their noses.

meanings.definition: Very great in amount or degree
meanings.sent1: She had the awfullest pile of laundry to fold after the trip.
meanings.sent2: The awfullest challenge of the race was the steep hill at the end.
meanings.sent3: The awfullest surprise awaited them at the bottom of the box.
meanings.sent4: The awfullest noise echoed through the empty hallway, startling everyone.
meanings.sent5: The awfullest joy filled her heart when she saw her long-lost friend.

meanings.sent1: The haunted house had the awfullest decorations, scaring all the visitors.
meanings.sent2: The awfullest part of the horror movie was the sudden appearance of the ghost.
meanings.sent3: The awfullest costume at the party made everyone jump in surprise.
meanings.sent4: The awfullest nightmare woke him up in a cold sweat, heart pounding.
meanings.sent5: The awfullest shadow in the dimly lit room sent shivers down her spine.
